string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: "Bona zonke izinhlelo zakho zokusebenza. Thinta isithonjana Sokuqalisa. @drawable/trash"
"Idonsa izinhlelo zokusebenza kwisikrini sakho Sasekhaya. Thinta & bamba uhlelo lokusebenza Kusiqalisi kuze kube yilapho ludlidliza."
"Hlela kabusha isikrini sakho Sasekhaya Thinta & ubambe intwana futhi lapho isidlidliza, idonsele lapho ofuna khona."
"Khipha izintwana. Thinta & bamba intwana futhi lapho isidlidliza, idonsele kwisithonjana Sodoti. @drawable/trash"
"Izikrini Zasekhaya Eziningi. Iya ngakwesokunxele noma esokudla ukushintsha. Donsa izintwana kwezinye izikrini."
"Uqedile ngale wijethi? Thinta & sibambe futhi lapho sidlidliza, sidonsele kwisithonjana Sodoti."
